author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-556 - Databinding fails for urn:// namespaces

author: gvanmatre
msg: Fixes for bugs 39121 and 38079 reported by Luca Conte. Fix for bug 39121 breaks backwards compatibility with version 1.2 of commons validator.  Version 1.3 of commons validator is required.  The requirements for registering validation rules has also changed.  See the bugzilla ticket for more details.

author: gvanmatre
msg: Fix for bug 39294 reported by Simon Matic Langford. I narrowed the scope from the general category of renderer's in command family to the Link and Button renderer type's that are specified in the JSF runtime and have know behavior.

author: ammulder
msg: Support for upgrade lists, obsoletes, etc.
As an example, now you can upgrade a minimal tomcat server to a J2EE tomcat

author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixed the rest of the broken unit tests, finished adding ResponseBuilder into IRequestCycle (for now), still need to re-write
some of the mock app test infrastructure so that ordering of keyset values isn't used to determine test assertions (ie should use
getValue() or similar for parameters and such instead of listing the keys )
